# valksor-logo

Valksor logo

## Examples

### Default

```html
<valksor-logo></valksor-logo>
```

### Set size

```html
<valksor-logo size="96px"></valksor-logo>
```

### Set width and height separately

```html
<valksor-logo width="120px" height="80px"></valksor-logo>
```

### Set fill color

```html
<valksor-logo size="80px" fill="#960018"></valksor-logo>
```

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->

## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                       | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `fill`   | `fill`    | Fill color for the logo paths. Defaults to `currentColor`.        | `string` | `undefined` |
| `height` | `height`  | Optional height override; falls back to `size` when not provided. | `string` | `undefined` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Controls both width and height. Accepts any valid CSS length.     | `string` | `'120px'`   |
| `width`  | `width`   | Optional width override; falls back to `size` when not provided.  | `string` | `undefined` |
